name: Sex Dice! Lite
description:
Do you want to spice things up for you and your lover? This app is just for you! Two modes – forplay and position/places will surly make your life more exciting!

Features:
- shake or tap dices to roll
- tap arrows button to change dices – 2 options to choose: forplay dices and position/places dices
- turn on/off sounds
- high-resolution images for retinadisplay.

Forplay dices posibilities:
- kiss, bite, lick, suck, touch, rub
- 6 best body parts

Position/places dices posibilities
- living room, car, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, garden
- 6 best love possition :)

Version free from ads available here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/id512204707?l=pl&ls=1&mt=8
